data.text: Lɛbiyai wola la zolooni ɠimalala nui ma,
Foovooi nii un ge la ba, é la faa ʋaa,
Kpakɔi ɓɛtɛʋɛ sooi laalɔɠɔma, kalafei ɠɛ ga soovalegi nɔnɔ,
Mina ɠimalala nui wooɠaaʋote ga ná-ɠimalalai ɠɛʋele,
Ɠimalala nui wooɠaaʋote, é zoloo ná-ɠimalalai ma,
Zɔi é keela woo ɠalivaazu ɠimalala nui ma,
Ʋelei mɛɠɛlɛ nui ɠɔɠɔiti ti zu la yɔɔɠɛ,
Ɠimalala nui maamusɛ vai ɠɛɛʋɛ eɠɛ
Ɠaingi é zoni dɔɔzo nui ya,
Ʋelei kpɛɛin ʋili nui la, é nuɓusɛi kpein maawanazu,
Eɠɛʋelei gilɛi a ɗa ɠale da ma, ná-unpiligi ma,
Ɗa nu ɠaana daai da ga gola ɠeleɠelegɛ,
Ɲaka nui ɠa ɗa ɠɛ ma: «Zalai ɠa pelei zu,
Eɠɛʋelei kpogi a ɗa lati da ná-saniɛlɛiti ga,
Ɲaka nui ɠa ɗa yeelɔ daami aniɲakai zu,
Ɲaka nui laaʋɛ ɓɔɠɔ la ga ɠigi ɠa ma,
È ɓɔɠɔ ʋili kpɔɛi ɠa, nii é la loni è ʋa,
Eɠɛ titi nui é abuleʋegiti pilisu,
pele ɠana zunui naa la, nii é seiɲɔɠɔi yaavazu,
Koʋi ʋalagi ɠa ɗa abui za,
Tiɠii ɠa ɗa abulekai ve, koʋii abui ɠaazo,
Zɔɠɔzuziɛ nui ná-kpɔɛiti kɛɛʋɛ eɠɛ ani ɲɛmigiti,
Wali ɠaei pɛai penɛi maazu,
Nui wɔinzeɠemai daavegai, toɠa ɗa maalɔɔɠu ga laawooiti,
Ni a ɠɛna kpɔɛ ʋagɔiti boga, mina la da,
Keleɠelegɛ gola ná-wɔinzeɠemai lɔɔɠu vai zu,
Zɔi a zeɠei wɔ, tɔ ɓɔɠɔ ɠa loo su,
È nui ta maawana ga zɛɛʋɛɛmai, naa ɠa ga è zili la.
